title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API, supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper with interactive REPL, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot (sugarforever/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (hmccarty/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example: ingest PDFs into Chroma and chat with Llama via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord (dannyhpy/ollama-discord)
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in chat; supports slash commands and custom models.

title: ollama-n8n-node (n8n-io/n8n-nodes-ollama)
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama workflows for no-code automations.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chat (go-skynet/ollama-chat)
summary: Lightweight Go REST wrapper that adds JWT auth and multi-user sessions atop Ollama.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-express (kevinw/ollama-express)
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and strong types for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with Blazor sample and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-zsh (pschmitt/ollama-zsh)
summary: Zsh plugin that adds aliases and autocompletion for the ollama CLI.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and summarization pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and slash commands using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack (gabrielcs/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack bot that answers questions with Ollama and keeps per-channel conversation threads.
